name: Wadality - Early Beta (Demo)
description:
This is an Early Beta Demo of  multiplayer VR action arena shooter! Take your friends and fight for the title of being called the toughest on the block. That locomotion system in the "Swimming" form gives a unique vertical level experience during the game. 

Character

You play as an abandoned chewed gum that has been thrown into the ocean. Deep-ocean radioactive particles penetrated the body of the gum and breathed life into it, endowing it with incredible abilities. As time passed, it gained all the tools it needed to begin its journey and prove its incredibility!

Battle Kraggs

As your hands are equipped with innovative... Battle Kraggs! They are made of a lightweight and durable metal alloy. They have universal mounts for attaching various kinds of weapons and tools. Two cute tiny little roaches are taped to the base, giving you the ability to climb walls and grab objects firmly.

Weapons

Your hero is loaded with a very good arsenal of several types of weapons. Explore each of the weapons and find your own unique style of fighting and asserting your rights. After all, there is no goal, there is only a way!

Support Public Beta

Right now we are on public beta stage. It's free for all, but you can support us by donating, or buying a Early Supporter pack. It's helps us in a game development and helps a lot to scale it (you will receive an in-game exclusive items when they are ready) !
